title: Build a REST API for user management
description:
## Scenario

You are extending the backend for **TaskFlow**.

## What you will build

A small REST API for user management.

## Requirements (must-have)

1. Implement login with email and password, return session token or 401.
2. GET /users returns 200 with JSON array when authenticated.

## Acceptance Criteria (definition of done)

- [ ] POST /login returns 200 with token for valid credentials
- [ ] POST /login returns 401 for invalid credentials
- [ ] GET /users returns 401 without valid token
- [ ] GET /users returns 200 with array when token valid
- [ ] Passwords are not stored in plain text
- [ ] Session token is validated on protected routes
- [ ] Invalid token returns 401
- [ ] API accepts JSON request body for login
- [ ] README documents how to run and test
- [ ] At least one integration test for login flow
- [ ] At least one integration test for GET /users

## Constraints

No real database required; in-memory or file is fine.

## Provided / Assumptions

Use any Node framework. Assume no existing codebase.

## Deliverables

1. Source code. 2. README with run instructions.

## Nice-to-haves (optional)

- Rate limiting. - Input validation with a schema library.
